h: <small><small><small><small>Web applications optimization via source code reduction</small></small></small></small>

What problems can be improved with this method
JavaScript execution time and HTML parsing is limited only by computational power of computer.
JavaScript execution time and HTML parsing is limited only by computational power of computer.
While internet connection speed is very limited
tti can be improved by reducing number of entities, loading extra information in real time.
So the philosophy is - if you want to see data, they have to be loaded, but order and load conditions can be changed "on the fly", without sacrificing efficiency.
